scripts.write:readme: node -e "const os=require('os'); const fs=require('fs');const pre='~~~';fs.writeFileSync('./README.md',['# neocities-deploy',pre,fs.readFileSync('./src/help.txt',{ encoding:'utf8'}),pre,'## Example',pre,'neocities-deploy --source public',pre].join(os.EOL));"
scripts.preversion: npm run test && npm run write:readme
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
